results.definition: a swollen bruise caused by a blow to the eye

a hand-operated electronic device that controls the coordinates of a cursor on your computer screen as you move it around on a pad; on the bottom of the device is a ball that rolls on the surface of the pad
examples: a mouse takes much more room than a trackball

results.definition: any of numerous small rodents typically resembling diminutive rats having pointed snouts and small ears on elongated bodies with slender usually hairless tails
manipulate the mouse of a computer
person who is quiet or timid
